body.p: In addition, the Board updated the terminology used in the description of the process of applying fundamental qualitative characteristics. To be consistent with the description of relevance in paragraph 2.6 of the 2018 Conceptual Framework and to avoid confusion with the use of the term ‘potential’ in the definition of an economic resource (see paragraphs BC4.8–BC4.9), the Board replaced the phrase ‘has the potential to be’ with ‘is capable of being’ in paragraph 2.21.
